ygData.subject: New Thread:  drum issues
ygData.msgSnippet: does it bother anyone else that our drum still appears as a flute when equipped?  i know this is only an aesthetic fix and not gameplay important, but it cant
ygData.messageBody:
does it bother anyone else that our drum still appears as a flute when
equipped? i know this is only an aesthetic fix and not gameplay
important, but it cant be that hard. not that big a deal, but i would
like to see it done.
Olczyk
9th lvl
Sol Ro

=====
Goaltending is a normal job. Sure! How would you like it in your job if every time you made a small mistake, a red light went on over your desk and fifteen thousand people stood up and yelled at you?
--Jacques Plante
